name: About Me
body: ### **About Me:** My name is Pei Ling, I am currently a senior at Burton High School residing in San Francisco, California. I was born in GuangZhou, China but came to America at the age of 2. I am creating this portfolio to hold all the works I have done over the years of AoAME, Academy of Arts, Media, Entertainment. Keeping a portfolio like this will not only enable to me keep my work for future hands but also for others to view my work. Enjoy! ### **Resume:** Click to see my Resume
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
